translation.hero_desc: I'm a web developer with a passion for creating beautiful and responsive websites. I have experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Reach out if you would like to learn more.
translation.front_desc: I'm a frontend developer with experience in building responsive and optimized sites
translation.back_desc: I have built backend APIs for some of my projects using Nodejs and Express
